column4: Traffic;Phnom Penh: Heavy rains and strong winds swept across the city on the afternoon of May 6
column5: causing damage to property and injuring at least two people.------A falling tree on Sihanouk Blvd caused a woman to fall from her motorcycle and suffer minor injuries.------A man was taken to hospital after a large advertising billboard collapsed on him on National Road 5.------There was also severe traffic congestion as authorities worked to clear the street of fallen trees and structures.
